name: Case Report
query:
SELECT 
CONCAT( header_case_type , "", " No. ", header_case_number, "", " of ", header_case_year) AS "Case No." ,
header_court AS "Court/Tribunal",
header_case_status AS "Status",
 appellant AS "Plaintiff(s)/Applicant(s)",
 respondent AS "Defendant(s)/Respondent(s)",
claims AS "Claim(s)",
liability AS "Estimated Liability"
FROM `tabCase` AS c
INNER JOIN `tabAppellant Table` AS tabA
ON c.name = tabA.parent
INNER JOIN `tabRespondent Table` AS tabR
ON c.name = tabR.parent
